item.title: Poly Furniture
item.description: Durable Poly Patio and Lawn Furniture Transform your backyard paradise with our beautiful poly furniture. Products Pricing Where Quality Comes Built In Materials Our furniture is only made from the highest quality poly lumber, and assembled with stainless steel fasteners and hardware. Durability Poly furniture never rots, splinters, cracks, chips, or peels. Bugs won't bother it. It is built to last for a lifetime. Low-Maintenance No painting, staining, or waterproofing required.

item.title: Thanks
item.description: Thank You! We received your form submission. We'll be in touch as soon as possible! BACK TO HOME

item.title: Contact Us
item.description: Contact Us We're here to help with any questions or with placing an order. 870-647-1265 7703 HWY 251 Pocahontas AR 72455 Or drop us a note and we'll reply as soon as possible Name Email Phone Message

item.title: Lawn Furniture
item.description: Comfortable Lawn Furniture Built To Last Relax in comfy lawn furniture built to stay beautiful. Delivered to your backyard. Products Pricing Where Quality Comes Built In Materials The only material that makes it thru our rigorous selection process is #1 or better dried after treated lumber. All fasteners are specially coated corrosion resistant screws. Sealing Our lawn furniture is treated with a high quality cedar tone water sealer on all pieces, unless special ordered otherwise.

item.title: Custom Built Gazebos
item.description: Gazebos Crafted With Care, Custom Built For You Your Arkansas gazebo builder, committed to building your gazebo from only the best materials. Options Pricing The Quality Difference Materials The only material that makes it thru our rigorous selection process is #1 or better dried after treated lumber. It is planed and routered to ensure a smooth finish and rounded edges. The roof decking for shingles is 3/4 inch plywood for a durable roof with no sags.
